page.title: 10HISTORIC BUILDINGS
page.content: There are seven large old buildings in our area. They are all situated to the west of the area. They are{Rowheath {Farm, Norwood Lodge, St. Andrew's {Church, Callaway House, Kenilworth, {Gutteridge Hall}and a Victorian building known as the{Old Monastery. {KENILWORTH:}Year Built:1904;Past Owners:10;Additions:An extension at the back;Ground:3 acres;Floors:2; Facilities:Stables,pond,barn and a peacock enclosure.6-fig. grid ref.: 152201. {THE OLD MONASTERY:}No longer used; no imformation available. Curtains on 2nd floor windows;a car outside- Road Fund Licence ran out Feb. '83. All grounds including tennis courts are overgrown. 6-fig. grid ref.:150212
